powers: It is unclear what her true powers are, she acts as a magical buffer to the vast magical abilities to her master Darklore. Her presence keeps his powers in check.
significantissues: Meer'lyn accompanies Darklore when they happened upon Adam Warlock (Warlock Chronicles #1, 1993): Meer'lyn is squished by Count Abyss. She recovers from her injuries and frees the others and Abyss is defeated (Warlock and the Infinity Watch #32-34 1994).
